DOC.criteria: The patient must give his/her inform sign consent The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The subject practice music intensively ( < 1h / day average ) The patient participate another study The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , guardianship The patient refuse sign consent It impossible correctly inform patient The patient pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The subject regularly practice music The subject suffer neurodegenerative disease central peripheral nervous system may affect sensorimotor control rhythmic movement upper limb The subject recent trauma upper limb The subject suffering uncorrected visual hearing impairment
